response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item boasts a unique blend of quality, innovation, and functionality that truly sets it apart. Given its unparalleled features and craftsmanship, we believe its value far exceeds $15,000. For this extraordinary piece, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $20,000. This is an opportunity to own a masterpiece that could potentially appreciate in value over time. I look forward to your consideration and hope to have the privilege of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 20000}
